edge: Atul Kulkarni portrays the character of Pottya Sawant in this movie.
Tabu essays the role of Mumtaz Sawant, who was formerly known as Ali Ansari in this movie.
Ananya Khare acts as Deepa Pandey, a bar girl in the movie.
Rajpal Yadav depicts the character of Iqbal Chamdi in this film.
In this movie, Shrivallabh Vyas portrays the character of Habib Bhai.
Vinay Apte essays the role of Inspector Gaikwad in this movie.
In this film, Upendra Limaye plays the role of Gokul, who is married to Deepa.
In this movie, Manoj Joshi acts as Chandrakant Bhau.
In this film, Rajanna portrays the character of Uma Shankar Pande.
Minakshi Sahani acts as Payal Sawant, who is the daughter of Pottya and Mumtaz in this movie.
In this film, Vishal Thakkar plays the role of Abhay Sawant, who is the son of Pottya and Mumtaz.
In this movie, Abhay Bhargava portrays the character of Hegde Anna.
Suhas Palshikar acts as Irfan Mamu, who is Mumtaz's uncle in this movie.
In this film, Shabbir Mir portrays the character of Uncle Pinto.
